_header: Saint Matthew the good gospeller / Tells til us on this manner
_description: Gospel for Septuagesima in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint matheu þe gude gospellereTels till vs on þis manere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …All if his biginyng war cleneHe endid in sin and þat was sene
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Simile est regnum celorum homini patrifamilias.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica in septuagesima Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 37va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.8-17.
